title: Rotating game mode queue now live!

replies.body: I usually  work weekends so I ususlly muss out on the fun. Why can't it last until tuesday or wednesday or even the whole week to make it more available for the player base and their life schedule s?

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

i like facepalms

Thought that was Brand pulling a John Cena xD
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Yeah...they want feedback on WHEN they do it. You are asking them to do something they are already planning doing.
Isn't this the third ascension weekend since they launched the rotating game modes? If you're going to repeat a game mode so often do one that the majority of players like playing.

This is only the 2nd time Ascension has come up. 

This will also be the 2nd time URF has come up in the rotation as well next week.
Dude a lot of people love Ascension. Sure it's not URF popular but it's popular. So shhhhh
but singed QAQ
Time to have 2 days worth of "How do you play this game?" to start again.

They tell you how to play it.
It's up to you to read the instructions and post the link to this post where ever there is someone who doesn't get it.
no doom bots or hexakill on summoners rift? how about one for all on howling abyss?
You guys are forgetting the small gem of nemsis draft...{{item:3073}}
2nd favorite mode behind ascension

I actually am waiting to see if Doom bots will come back, nothing like getting completely wrecked by a Garen coming out of a bush when he's not even on the team comp. It was a fun game mode and I enjoyed it more so than it frustrated me at level 5. It gave the bots a challenge and in all honesty helped me get better at dodging as well as thinking over my life choices. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
What about black market brawl {{item:3742}}
Can't wait for URF next weekend!! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
Honestly I would love the idea of extending it into Monday because I usually work most of the weekend leaving _very_ little time to play the rotating game modes.

See, Riot, and anybody else who reads this, I love the idea of the rotating game mode, but I think the way you implemented it, isn't really the best. Due to a schedule, which I won't explain, I can generally play on the weekends every other week, sometimes not even then, meaning that I will miss many game modes. And frankly, from what I've heard, I'm not the only person with this problem. The problem of, due to schedule, missing the game modes you really want to play, (For me it is URF), and feeling really upset and slightly forgotten about it. I know I'm kinda ranting here, but I just wanted to put this out, in the hope that someone would see it, because it is really frustrating hearing all my friends talking about how much fun they are having in these game modes, when generally I can't play them.

The TL;DR is that I love the idea of rotating game mode, but I feel that many people will miss the game modes they love.

What about doombots????
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
Dude it going to be a while for Doombots. They got to redo pretty much everything for that mode.

Yeah, L4TENCY said that Doom Bots have broken since they were first released.
So they're going to need to completely remake them if they want to re-release the mode, which is a very time consuming process!
Oh that's good know there is a chance to see DoomBots again. That's the mode I have been hoping to see thrown into this revisit mode rotation the most.
Maybe it will come out for Halloween or the harrowing whatever they call it
There's one game mode that I would love to have added to the list even though it's unpopular. I want to play doom bots again, it was a fun challenge and would love to see it again.
A lot of us want doom bots actually :)
Am I the only one who wants Showdown? Heck I'll even take Doom Bots, Nemesis pick and Hexa on the Rift over, the Poroking but that's just me.

Showdown was the 1v1 or 2v2 gamemode right? I Played it when a was a pre-30 scrub. Maybe make it a 2 out of 3.
Round 1: start at level 1 with 500g
Round 2: start at level 6 with 2000g
Round 3: start at level 16 with 10000g
Ascension is my personal favorite mode
Im so Exited Thank Riot your the best and im so exited to un ULTRA RAPID FIRE (urf) and PORO KING

I'm just curious, what are the possibilities of having a 'Create your Own' Poll/Survey Suggestion post, where the community takes two gamemodes to combine for a weekend? For example, Hexakill + One For All, you'd take the mechanics of Hexakill, so six players, and you do a vote like you would in One For All.

Just an idea I had, and was wondering if something like this would be at all doable.

I love to play URF in custom game modes! I get burnt out on it playing 5v5 "Normals" but practicing Flashes and mechanics with friends is the best part!! Consider making URF Custom matches available the entire week of 5/20?
It would be amazing to see Nemesis Draft in the rotating queue! 10 man support games were hilarious.
what time does urf come out today?
What Time are you guys releasing urf mode this week?
where the h*ll is DOOM BOTS OF DOOM{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Put these up for 4-5 days instead of 3 days because it is not enough time for most people.

So riot, I read xeraths buffs, says he's not able to be killed by consume, so tell me why, when I play, does the enemy nunu repeatedly kill xerath and get ascended, using consume to kill it every time?
Cant Wait to play PORO KING AND URF :D
Can Ascension game mode stay to replace crystal scar 5v5 mode that we lost
{{champion:33}}  ok
where's dump bot mode
{{champion:266}}
eh
i hope they bring back Enemy of my enemy, and doom bots again
Enemy of my enemy? ... Do you mean Nemesis Draft or something?
Yes, Nemesis Draft is what i was meaning. my friends and i call it Enemy of my Enemy XD habit.
